long_description: The blurr Betsy jeans offer the softness of organic cotton plus enough stretch to let you move freely and comfortably whether you're traveling, biking or just relaxing at home. Organic cotton denim with a touch of spandex provides a soft, durable fabric. Wide straight legs offer a comfortable fit; roll up and secure the cuffs with button tabs for a cropped look. Betsy jeans feature front welt pockets and rear patch pockets. Waistband is higher in the back than in the front for total comfort and coverage. Overstock.
short_description: The blurr Betsy jeans offer the softness of organic cotton plus enough stretch to let you move freely and comfortably whether you're traveling, biking or just relaxing at home.
